history.proof: intros Q a p cnd1 irr. unfold irreducible in irr. unfold irreducible. intros q red. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros Q a p cnd1 irr.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p : list (Term A n) cnd1 : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) irr : forall q : list (Term A n), ~ reduce Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q q : list (Term A n) red : reduce Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) q Unable to unify "reduce Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) ?M2198 -> False" with "False".

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p : list (Term A n) cnd1 : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) irr : forall q : list (Term A n), ~ reduce Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q q : list (Term A n) red : reduce Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) q Unable to unify "reduce ?M2198 ?M2201 ?M2202" with "False".

original: intros Q a p cnd1 irr. unfold irreducible in irr. unfold irreducible. intros q red. apply irr. intros q' red'. apply red. apply reduce_inv. apply red'. reflexivity. apply canonical_spminusf. apply spminusf_multTerm. apply eqp_spminusf_com. apply divP_ltT_comp. apply plusTerm_is_pX. apply canonical_spminusf_full. apply mults_pO. apply mults_minusTerm. apply mults_dist_minuspf.
